articles.title: Message of Sympathy to Spanish PM
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to Spanish PM 
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- Premier of the DPRK Cabinet Pak Pong Ju on Friday sent a message of sympathy to Spanish Prime Minister Mariano Rajoy Brey over a terrorist attack in Barcelona of Spain that caused big casualties.
					 The message hoped that the government and people of Spain would soon eradicate the aftereffects of the terrorist attack, saying that the Korean people are sharing sadness with the Spanish people and it is the consistent stand of the DPRK government to oppose all forms of terrorism.
					
					 On the same day, DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho sent a similar message to Alfonso Dastis Quecedo, minister of Foreign Affairs and Cooperation of Spain.

articles.title: Cambodian Party Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Cambodian Party Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the FUNCINPEC Party of Cambodia led by Vice-Chairman Chap Nhalyvoud visited Mangyongdae, birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Being briefed on the revolutionary history of Kim Il Sung and his family members at his old home, the guests looked round the relics preserved there with much care.
					
					 The delegation toured the Party Founding Museum, the Youth Movement Museum, the Sci-Tech Complex, etc.

articles.title: Officials of Trade Union Organizations Start Study Tour of Area of Mt Paektu
articles.content:
Officials of Trade Union Organizations Start Study Tour of Area of Mt Paektu
 Hyesan, August 20 (KCNA) -- Officials of the trade union organizations across the country had a meeting before the Monument to the Victorious Battle of Pochonbo in Hyesan City, Ryanggang Province on Sunday to start their study tour of the revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt Paektu on the occasion of the 57th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership
					 They laid a floral basket and bouquets before the statue of President Kim Il Sung at the monument and paid tribute to him.
					
					 At the meeting a reporter and speakers stressed the need to deeply grasp the greatness of the three commanders of Mt Paektu and the Songun revolutionary history through the study tour and more firmly arm themselves with the revolutionary traditions of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 They said that they should positively follow patriotism, comradeship and revolutionary spirit of self-reliance and revolutionary optimism of the anti-Japanese revolutionary forerunners and thus fully demonstrate the mettle of the working class of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in the drive for building a socialist power.
					
					 After the meeting the officials went round the Monument to the Victorious Battle of Pochonbo.

articles.title: Mass Rallies Support DPRK Government's Statement
articles.content:
Mass Rallies Support DPRK Government's Statement
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- Rallies are unabated in cities and counties to support the statement of the government of the DPRK.
					 Attending them were officials of local party and power organs, working people's organizations, factories, enterprises and co-op farms, and working people, youths and students.
					
					 The statement of the DPRK government was read out at the rallies to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The speakers denounced the beast-like U.S. for fabricating the illegal "sanctions resolution" on the DPRK in a bid to wipe out the socialist bulwark from the planet.
					
					 They fully supported the statement which solemnly declared that the DPRK would respond by taking resolute retaliatory measures as the U.S. launched full-scale provocation against the DPRK across all fields of politics, economy and military.
					
					 They called for foiling the vicious sanctions and blockade of the enemies in the spirit of self-development and thus opening a wide avenue to the building of a power country.
					
					 Then there were mass demonstrations.
					
					 Provincial, city and county joint meetings of the Korean Children's Union organizations were also held to vow to foil the U.S. imperialists' reckless nuclear war hysteria.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Urges U.S. to Properly Face up to Reality, Though Belatedly
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Urges U.S. to Properly Face up to Reality, Though Belatedly
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- A litany of rhetoric is ringing out in the U.S. to the effect that its fixing the northern half of the Republic where its sovereignty is exercised as a theatre of "preventive war" may be an "ideal option" not harmful to the U.S. and that it will take the most resolute action.
					 Rodong Sinmun in a commentary Sunday terms this a vivid expression of the Yankee-style way of thinking keen on achieving its purpose of aggression.
					
					 It will be useless even though the U.S. ruling forces introduce nuclear strategic assets into the vicinity of the Korean peninsula, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. should properly face up to the reality, though belatedly.
					
					 The DPRK is the strongest possessor of ICBM capable of striking the U.S. mainland from anywhere and anytime as it pleases. Neither Guam nor Hawaii nor the U.S. mainland can dodge the merciless strike of the Strategic Force of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 The KPA is keeping a high alert, fully ready to contain the enemies. It will take resolute steps the moment even a slight sign of the "preventive war" is spotted. 
					
					 The U.S. has to be responsible for the ensuing disasters.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams War Confab of U.S. and S. Korean Puppet Forces
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams War Confab of U.S. and S. Korean Puppet Forces
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- The U.S. Defense Department announced that the U.S. will start the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises from Monday together with the south Korean puppet forces.
					 It was reported that shortly ago Trump and the south Korean puppet chief executive had a special confab over a reckless play with fire, vociferating about stronger cooperation for "deterrence". According to this, Joseph Dunford, chairman of the U.S. Joint Chiefs of Staff, toured south Korea while talking about examination of combined defense posture and was closeted with the bosses of the puppet military.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun in a commentary Sunday terms it a war confab between hysteric master and stooge ignorant of the situation.
					
					 The Trump group's declaration of the reckless nuclear war exercises against the DPRK along with the vociferous call for the "beheading operation", "special operation", "preemptive attack on the north" and "preventive war" is a reckless behavior driving the situation into the uncontrollable phase of a nuclear war.
					
					 The U.S. is still daring provoke the DPRK by relying on its strength, a reckless act bereft of even the elementary judgment of how the situation changes and who its rival is, and a foolish act of those unable to estimate gains and losses.
					
					 The U.S. is seriously mistaken if it thinks that a war is something to be grappled by a country across the Pacific when it is escalating the military tensions in the Korean peninsula and its vicinity.
					
					 It is not only the American empire that has the right. There is no law that prohibits others from doing what one is doing.
					
					 The U.S. should think and act with reason.
					
					 The perspective of the U.S. by which it calculates its land will be safe and death will be a thing belonging to others only is harmful to the U.S.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Warmongers' Ridiculous Confrontation Racket Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Warmongers' Ridiculous Confrontation Racket Slammed
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- Song Yong Mu, puppet defense minister of south Korea, called for "maintenance of perfect military posture" at the "video meeting of operation commanding officers of the army". He visited a unit on Yonphyong Island where he blared that "if the north provokes, the south should fight with confidence". Ri Sun Jin, chairman of the puppet joint chiefs of staff, claimed at the "National Assembly" that the south is "ready for preemptive strike", inciting military confrontation.
					 Minju Joson in a commentary Sunday terms such confrontation racket kicked up by the puppet warmongers a ridiculous behavior of idiots unaware of the pitiful plight of the U.S. that has faced the final doom.
					
					 Such act of the poor colonial stooges on whom the DPRK does not count at all may make the whole of south Korea, to say nothing of Seoul, like Yonphyong Island which suffered the fire of punishment, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The puppet warmongers had better clearly understand how the world goes around, how pitiful their plight is and how strong the will of all the service personnel and people of the DPRK for revenge is.
					
					 If they persist in bluffing, they will be made to pay a price for it and will be useless when they regrets belatedly.
					
					 Such ignorant war maniacs as Song Yong Mu and Ri Sun Jin should clearly understand that prudence is a good way out, not resorting to belligerent rackets.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Flails S. Korean Authorities for Pushing forward Additional Deployment of THAAD
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Flails S. Korean Authorities for Pushing forward Additional Deployment of THAAD
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet Ministry of Defense decided to additionally deploy four launch pads of THAAD within this year under the pretext of coping with the "missile threat from the north", and conducted a small-scale test on its environmental impact.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Sunday brands the puppet military's act as an unpardonable one against the nation aimed at unconditionally accepting the demand of its U.S. master even at the sacrifice of the destiny and interests of the south Korean people.
					
					 The commentary says that the south Korean authorities have talked about the "validity of procedure" related with the deployment of THAAD so far but their recent act clearly shows that their talks are a plan for rendering the deployment of THAAD legal by misleading the public opinion at home and abroad.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 From the outset, the south Korean ruling forces have had no intention to roll back the plan for deploying THAAD.
					
					 On the contrary, they have borne an ill will to do harm to the fellow countrymen through tightened "alliance" with the U.S. by deploying THAAD. The prevailing situation in south Korea clearly proves it.
					
					 The south Korean authorities who kneeled down to their U.S. master are positively joining in their deployment of THAAD by instigating the puppet military. Their act is the most foolish one in which they put their necks into the noose of subordination and ruin.
					
					 Their act of accelerating the additional deployment of THAAD is nothing but a last-ditch effort of poor guys who rush about unaware of their doom.

articles.title: Japan Will Be Made to Pay Price for Its Crimes: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Japan Will Be Made to Pay Price for Its Crimes: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- The Japanese imperialist aggressors, looking for an opportunity to invade Korea while talking about "theory of the conquest of Korea" after "the 1868 Meiji Restoration", fabricated the "Unyo-maru" Incident in September 1875 and cooked up the brigandish "Kanghwa Island Treaty" the next year by threatening the Korean feudal government under the pretext. Early in the 20th century, they posed undisguised threats to Korea, faking up illegal treaties including the "Ulsa (1905) Five-point Treaty" and turning Korea into its complete colony.
					 Japan is the sworn enemy as it committed indelible crimes against the Korean people and left incurable wounds to them, says Rodong Sinmun in an article Sunday.
					
					 It is the legal, moral and international duty for Japan to make sincere apology and compensation for the past hideous crimes it committed against the Korean nation, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 However, Japan, far from making sincere apology and compensation for its past crimes, is dreaming of revival of militarism while distorting its bloody history of aggression and openly revealing its ambition for reinvasion.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK are closely watching the moves of the Japanese reactionaries adding new crimes to the old ones. The Korean people are keeping tabs on all the crimes committed by Japan in the past. They will certainly make Japan pay a price for them.

articles.title: South Korean Soldiers Commit Sexual Abuses
articles.content:
South Korean Soldiers Commit Sexual Abuses
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- Sexual abuses against women are rampant among soldiers of the south Korean puppet army, according to Munhwa Ilbo of south Korea.
					 A solider of the puppet army together with a gangster made a woman heavily drunken at a restaurant in Seoul on Aug. 14 and raped her.
					
					 Another solider of the puppet army sexually abused a girl student at a beach resort in South Chungchong Province on Aug. 11.
					
					 A sergeant beat a woman on the way home at dawn and raped her in June.

articles.title: Unethical Act in S. Korean Puppet Army Exposed
articles.content:
Unethical Act in S. Korean Puppet Army Exposed
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- A wing commander of a unit of the south Korean puppet air force maltreated soldiers, according to KBS of south Korea on August 17.
					 He showered upon them such abuses as "human scum" and "parasite".

articles.title: Website Reopens by S. Korean Organization
articles.content:
Website Reopens by S. Korean Organization
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- According to the south Korean online paper Jaju Sibo, the South Headquarters of the Pan-National Alliance for Korea's Reunification on Aug. 15 announced the reinstallation of a website closed by the Lee Myung Bak and Park Geun Hye groups of traitors.
					 The organization asserted that a senseless and unreasonable crackdown on the strength of the "Security Law" being rejected by the international community has to be repealed without fail.
					
					 They stressed that they decided to reinstall the website and resume its operation, adding that the crackdown by the Lee Myung Bak and Park Geun Hye group of traitors is the unreasonable act of encroaching on the freedom of thinking and expression and suppressing the reunification movement.

articles.title: Explosion Case Occurs in S. Korean Puppet Unit
articles.content:
Explosion Case Occurs in S. Korean Puppet Unit
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- An explosion occurred at an artillery piece at the gun firing range in Cholwon County, south Korean Kangwon Province on August 18, according to CBS of south Korea on the same day. Ten artillery pieces were waging a firing drill.
					 The fire caused by explosion left two soldiers dead and five others heavily wounded.

articles.title: Mended Inter-Korean Relations Demanded by S. Korean Organization
articles.content:
Mended Inter-Korean Relations Demanded by S. Korean Organization
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- The South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration made public an appeal on Aug. 15 denouncing the U.S. and south Korean authorities for aggravating the danger of a war on the Korean peninsula and demanding the improvement of the inter-Korean relations and conclusion of a peace accord between the DPRK and the U.S.
					 The appeal said that the unprecedented military tension is prevailing on the peninsula and the future of the peninsula should be decided by the Korean nation.
					
					 Stressing that no country should talk about any war such as a "preventative war" on the peninsula, they asserted that the normalization of the relations and conclusion of the peace pact are necessary for easing the military conflict on the peninsula.
					
					 They urged the U.S. and south Korean authorities to stop every act which can cause the military conflict on the peninsula such as joint military exercises.
					
					 The appeal called upon all compatriots to usher in the phase of exchange and solidarity among various circles.

articles.title: Korea's Liberation Celebrated in Germany
articles.content:
Korea's Liberation Celebrated in Germany
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- A seminar and book and photo exhibition and solidarity meeting were held in Berlin and other places of Germany from Aug. 5 to 14 in celebration of the 72nd anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 Attending them were public figures and citizens of Germany.
					
					 Arnulf Piontec, chief of the Berlin Juche Idea Study Group of Germany, said that President Kim Il Sung liberated Korea from the colonial rule of the Japanese imperialists and founded a genuine people's country in Korea.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Today the DPRK has emerged as a fully-fledged nuclear power with H-bombs and ICBMs under the wise guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The situation clearly shows how just the country's steps to bolster up its nuclear deterrent for self-defense are.
					
					 We will as ever fully support the just cause of the Korean people.
					
					 Thomas Lichter, vice-chairman of the Federal Republic of Germany-DPRK Association, said that the U.S. and the vassal forces are escalating the sanctions and pressure on the DPRK to extremely strain the situation but the final victory is in store for the DPRK.
					
					 Torsten Schoevitz, chairman of the Communist Party of Germany and chief of the Group for the Study of the Works of Comrade Kim Il Sung and Comrade Kim Jong Il, said that the DPRK, which is firmly safeguarding the cause of socialism and victoriously advancing it, standing up against the imperialist allied forces led by the U.S., has become a beacon of hope for the world progressives.
					
					 Manfred Schneider, chief of the German Group for the Study of Korean Culture, said that the world is admiring the DPRK which has emerged as a nuclear power of Juche and no one can block its advance.
					
					 Messages of greeting to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the events.

articles.title: DPRK's Successful Test-fire of ICBM Hailed by British Bodies
articles.content:
DPRK's Successful Test-fire of ICBM Hailed by British Bodies
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- British bodies made public statements on July 29 and 30 hailing the successful second test-fire of ICBM Hwasong-14 in the DPRK.
					 The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Korean Friendship Association UK and the British Solidarity Committee for Peace and Reunification of the Korean Peninsula, in a joint statement, said:
					
					 We pay tribute to Juche Korea for succeeding in the above-said test-fire.
					
					 The successful test-fire was another great victory registered by the DPRK in the standoff with the U.S. imperialists, wrecker of global peace and bulwark of neo-colonialism.
					
					 The DPRK is admired by the whole world for having dealt a series of blows to the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 The DPRK's ICBM test-fire is the legitimate right of a sovereign state for national defense.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists should recognize the status of the DPRK as a nuclear power.
					
					 Final victory belongs to Juche Korea.
					
					 The Stoke－on－Trent Branch of the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea said in a statement:
					
					 The successful test-fire of ICBM in the DPRK is the fruition of the Songun revolutionary leadership of respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Korean people's bolstering of nuclear deterrent is a wise step in view of the aggressive actions of the U.S. imperialists engrossed in high-handed and arbitrary practices across the world.
					
					 As long as the U.S. imperialists, the chieftain of aggression, exist, the Korean people will further step up the bolstering of their nuclear deterrent for self-defence.
